#summary How to compile CajuScript
#labels compile,cajuscript,compilinggetting

= Introduction =

This pages teachs you how to get and compile CajuScript on your machine.
You will need:

1. Java - JDK (http://www.java.sun.com)
2. Apache Ant (http://ant.apache.org)
3. Subversion
4. CajuScript

== Getting CajuScript ==

1.	Open a prompt (DOS, Bash, etc) and go to the desired folder.
2.	Type the command:

`svn checkout http://cajuscript.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ cajuscript`

3.	Now, you will have a folder named “cajuscript”. Enter it.
4.	Inside the folder, type the command:

`ant`

5.	It will compile all files and generate a .jar file inside the “dist” folder.
6.	Now, let´s have some fun:

`java –cp dist/cajuscript-DATE.jar   irc.CajuConsole`
